text: Sonic Jam is a 1997 video game compilation that has Sonic the Hedgehog, Sonic the Hedgehog 2, Sonic the Hedgehog 3 and Sonic & Knuckles. It also features Sonic World, a 3D special game. It was developed by Sonic Team. It was published by Sega for the Sega Saturn. title: Sonic Jam
